name: CoderLife
description:
Do you know how to survive in our world? Or may be sometimes you worked as a software developer?

CoderLife will check your skills in making coder's life better! 

Control life stats, speed up simulation time for better results and make proger not to die... But if it happens ... You can always restart your simulation! 

But be careful, who knows ... may be, this proger, you know, is YOU ...
